\eject \pdfpagewidth=400mm \pdfpageheight=400mm

```{r}
library(MeltR)
library(tidyverse)
devtools::load_all()
df = df.absorbance %>% filter(Experiment == "CROWD DP1")
meltR.A(df,
        NucAcid = c("RNA", "CGCGCG"),
        Mmodel = "Homoduplex.2State",
        concT = 80,
        fitTs = c(15, 70),
        wavelength = 280)
```
